AppKickstarter.timer

类 Timer.TimerMsg

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppKickstarter.timer.Timer.TimerMsg
  • 封闭类:
    Timer

    public static class Timer.TimerMsg
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for handling the "details" field of a Timer Msg.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明

    • 构造器详细资料

      • TimerMsg

        public TimerMsg(Msg.Type type,
                int timerID,
                long sleepTime)
        Constructor of a TimerMsg (used for building the details field of a msg).
        参数:
        type - Msg type (must be SetTimer, CancelTimer or TimesUp)
        timerID - the timer ID
        sleepTime - the sleep time (in millisecond)

      • TimerMsg

        public TimerMsg(java.lang.String msg)
        Constructor of a TimerMsg (used for extracting data from the details field of a msg)
        参数:
        msg - the message
